text: Yuriy Mikhaylovich Poyarkov (, 10 February 1937 - 10 February 2017) was a Ukrainian volleyball player. He competed for the Soviet Union in the 1964 Summer Olympics, in the 1968 Summer Olympics, and in the 1972 Summer Olympics. Poyarkov died on his 80th birthday on 10 February 2017 in Kharkiv, Ukraine.Умер почётный гражданин Харькова Юрий Поярков ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Ukrainian volleyball players
title: Yuriy Poyarkov
